title: Search for multiple keywords in one column using Power Query
excerpt: If you need to search and find for multiple keywords in one column in Power Query, here is a very straight forward way to do that :)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
